maqras.text: 78|1|sihamte ki bisaye parasparae sodha-poca karai ache
78|2|mahasambadatora bisaye
78|3|yi bisaye sihamte matanaikya karaiche.
78|4|Ketiya'o nahaya, sihamte atisighrae'i janibalai paba.
78|5|Tarapichata, ketiya'o nahaya, sihamte atisighrae'i janibalai paba.
78|6|Ami prthiraikhanaka sayya banoraa na'ine
78|7|arau parbatasamuhaka peraeka
78|8|arau ami tomalokaka srsti karaicho yoraa-yoraa.
78|9|Arau tomalokara topanika karaicho bisraama.
78|10|Arau raatika karai dicho ararana.
78|11|Arau dinaka karai dicho jiraika uparjanara samaya.
78|12|Arau ami tomalokara oparata nirmana karaicho sudrrha satakhana akasa.
78|13|Arau ami srsti karaicho eti ujjala pradipa.
78|14|Arau ami barsana karaicho meghamalara paraa pracura pani.
78|15|Yate tara dbaraa ami utpanna karaiba parao sasya arau udbhida.
78|16|Arau ghana sannibista udyana.
78|17|Niscaya nirdharaita ache bicarara dina.
78|18|Se'i dina sinata phum diya ha’ba tetiya tomaloke dale dale ahiba.
78|19|Arau akasakhana khuli diya ha’ba, phalata i ha’ba bahu duraarabisista.
78|20|Arau parbatasamuhaka calita karaa ha’ba, phalata se'ibora hai yaba balimaya maraicikara darae.
78|21|Niscaya jahannama khapa pati raai ache.
78|22|Simalanghanakarai sakalara babe pratyarartanasthala.
78|23|Tata sihamte yuga yuga dharai arasthana karaiba.
78|24|Tata sihamte sitalata ba upayukta pani'o bhoga karaiba noraaraiba.
78|25|Utala pani arau durgandhamaya pumjara bahirae.
78|26|E'itorae'i upayukta pratiphala.
78|27|Niscaya sihamte ketiya'o hicaba-nikacara asa karaa nachila.
78|28|Arau sihamte amara nidarsanaralika kathorabharae mithyaraopa karaichila.
78|29|Arau ami pratito bastu likhitabharae samraksana karai raakhicho.
78|30|Eteke bhoga karaa, ami tomalokara babe sastira bahirae ana eko brd'dhi nakarao.
78|31|Niscaya muttakbisakalara babe ache saphalata.
78|32|Udyanasamuha arau angurasamuha.
78|33|Arau samabayasiya uda`bhinna nara-yurati tarauni.
78|34|Arau paraipurna panapatra.
78|35|Tata te'omloke kono anarthaka katha arau micha bakya'o suna napaba.
78|36|Aponara pratipalakara phalara paraa puraskara, yathocita danasbaraupa.
78|37|Yijana akasasamuha arau prthirai arau e'i dutara majata yi ache sakalorae pratipalaka, parama karaunamaya, te'omra ocarata abedana-nibedanara sakti sihamtara karao nathakiba.
78|38|Se'idina rauha arau phiraistasakala saraibad'dhabharae thiya ha’ba; rahamane yaka anumati diba tara bahirae kone'o katha naka’ba, arau te'om sathika katha ka’ba.
78|39|E'i dinato satya, eteke yara iccha siye tara pratipalakara ocarata asraya grahana karaka.
78|40|Niscaya ami tomalokaka ati nikatararti sasti samparke satarka karailo. Yidina manuhe nija krtakarma dekhibalai paba arau kaphirae ka’ba, haya! Ma'i yadi mati ha'lohemtena.
79|1|Sapata nirmamabharae utpatanakaraisakalara.
79|2|Arau mrdubharae bandhanamuktakaraisakalara.
79|3|Arau tibragatita samturai phuraasakalara.
79|4|Arau drautagatita agabarhi yoraasakalara.
79|5|Tara pichata yaratiya kama nirbahakaraisakalara.
79|6|Se'idina kampanakaraiye prakampita karaiba.
79|7|Taka anusarana karaiba parabarti kampanakarai.
79|8|Se'idina kichumana hrdaya, bhayata santrasta ha’ba.
79|9|Sihamtara drstisamuha atankita hai nata ha’ba.
79|10|Sihamte kaya, ‘ami akau agara arasthata ubhati yama ne
79|11|yetiya ami curnabicurna asthita parainata hama’
79|12|sihamte kaya, ‘yadi e'itorae haya tente e'ito eta ksatikara pratyarartana’.
79|13|Prakrtate e'ito eta biraata sabda.
79|14|Tatksanata bhu-prsthata sihamtara abirbhara ha’ba.
79|15|Muchara ghatanato tumi pa'ichane
79|16|yetiya te'omra pratipalake te'omka paraitra turaa upatyakata mati kaichila
79|17|‘phira'a'unara ocaralai yoraa niscaya si simalanghana karaiche
79|18|tara pichata taka koraa ‘tumi paraitra ha’ba bicaraa ne
79|19|arau ma'i tomaka tomara pratipalakara pine pathapradarsana karao, yate tumi te'omka bhaya karaa’.
79|20|Tara pichata, te'om taka maha nidarsana dekhuraale.
79|21|Kintu si asbikara karaile arau aman'ya karaile.
79|22|Tara pichata te'om si pichaphale ubhati pratibidhanata sacesta ha’la.
79|23|Tara pichata sakaloke ekatraita karai ghosana karaile
79|24|arau ka’le, ‘maye tomalokara sarbocca pratipalaka’.
79|25|Arasesata allahe taka akhiraata arau prthiraira drstantamulaka sasti pradana karaile.
79|26|Niscaya yiye bhaya karae tara babe iyata siksa ache.
79|27|Tomalokaka srsti karaato kathina ne akasa srsti karaa kathina? Teraemi iyaka nirmana karaiche.
79|28|Teraemi iyara calakhanaka su'ucca karaiche arau subin'yasta karaiche.
79|29|Arau teraemi iyara raatika karaiche andhakara arau prakasa karaiche purbahnara pohara.
79|30|Tara pichata, te'om prthiraikhanaka bistrta karaiche.
79|31|Teraemi tara paraa uliya'iche pani arau trnabhumi
79|32|arau parbatasamuhaka teraemi sthapana karaiche
79|33|e'ibora tomalokara arau tomalokara gharaciya jantuborara babe jiranopakarana sbaraupa.
79|34|Arau yidina mahasankata upasthita ha’ba
79|35|se'idina manuhe smarana karaiba yito si (bigata dinata) karaiche
79|36|arau jahannama prakasa karaa ha’ba drstimana lokasakalara babe.
79|37|Eteke yiye simalanghana karae
79|38|arau prthiraira jiranaka agraadhikara diye
79|39|Niscaya jahanname'i ha’ba tara abasasthala.
79|40|Arau yiye tara pratipalakara sanmukhata thiya ha’balai bhaya karae arau kuprabrttira paraa nijake birata raakhe
79|41|niscaya jannate'i ha’ba tara abasasthala.
79|42|Sihamte tomaka kiyamata samparke prasna karae ye, i ketiya sanghatita ha’ba
79|43|se'ito alocana karaara (prakrta) jnana tomara achene
79|44|iyara prakrta jnana (kerala) tomara pratipalakara ocarata
79|45|yiye iyaka bhaya karae tumi kerala tara babe satarkakarai.
79|46|Yidina sihamte iyaka dekhiba se'idina sihamtara e'ito dharana haba ye, sihamte prthiraita kerala eta sandhiya athaba eta prabhatatakai bechi samaya arasthana karaa nachila.
